title: Copying FF Profile from boot crashed HD to new HD
content: AW18 500GB mSata refused to boot. Used MiniTool Pro 12.6 to attempt recover to new Installed new mSATA, new copy of Win7Pro, no joy. Put mSata into USB enclosure, copied all 423GB to 5 TB drive, to use as source for profile. READ many versions of support pages here, copied whole "old" profile from \Roaming\profile to new drive \profiles folder. No Joy. Created NEW profile, shutdown FF, copied 'old" folder to new, restarted, no joy. Deleted NEW profile, tried copying just the logins.json, key4.db overwriting default profile files, no joy. Tried copying profile from original 500GB mSATA in case the copying to 5TB was corrupt ( used Total Commander copy with verify) I think I have tried almost all the various solutions, still no joy. Anybody have any solutions to try ( both very recent FF versions ( last two weeks) ? Thanks in advance!
creator: al.guerra52

title: Can not Sign in to my anti virus account.  fire fox just keeps putting sign in page back after i fill out and hit sign in
content:
I con no longer sign in to my norton 360 account with firefox browser. Just all of a sudden it just repeats the sign-in page over and over. I can not use my norton account. I type in My.norton.com and firefox will take me to the sign in web page. I click on sign-in and my saved info appears. Its the right info. But, when I click on sign-in all I get is the same sign in page. OVER AND OVER AND OVER. I have spent over 2 hours with norton support twice. They have done a great job. Tried many different things. Scanning and reinstalling and running SFC, DISM, clearing cache, changing settings and other things. So I am here asking you if know why firefox will not let me in to my norton360 account.

please help. It was working and nothing has changed so it must be something with firefox.
creator: jpet7305

title: M1 & Firefox Privacy Issues
content:
Is there some issues with FireFox running on Apple's original M1 processor?

Regardless of selecting an email or ID, then hitting "Shift + Delete" the login field will continue to not only hold the login used on the site previously, but also other IDs.

When logging into mozilla.org for support, my email address didn't appear, however my business email did. I've never entered my business email address on Mozilla's website.
creator: dasatec

title: "Your browser can't play this video" on YouTube
content: Hello! Just installed Ubuntu 20.04.4 on my laptop and now find that I'm not able to watch some YouTube videos on Firefox 97. It seems mainly just live streams that I can't watch. When I go to one it shows "Your browser can't play this video...Learn more" in the video window. Clicking Learn More takes me to a page that doesn't explain what the problem is. Any idea what the fix might be? The same videos play just fine on other devices on my network. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
creator: kdpryor

title: Opening links in a new tab and other things on pages (sometimes) rapidly duplicated

title: Encounterig Problem hen Trying To Restore My Profile
content:
I use Facebook for many years. Last time used it was 12 hours ago. Then, 1 hour ago, Firefox did not start, all I was able to do was to exit (option inside a small Firefox Problem Window).

I downloaded the installation files, and re-installed Firefox. It started with the two Firefox Start Pages. But I expected to see all my tabs and browsing history and plugins.

So I copied the files from my previous profile into the folder of the newly created profile after I deleted the new profile files. But now, when starting Firefox, I get again a small window with the option to create again a new empty profile or just to exit. It says I would use an "older" version of Firefox and this could destroy my profile.

What must I do to get back all my tabs and plugins and all that?
creator: SvenLittkowski
